name: Last Week (Prototype)
description:
Programming - Tim Steiner, Walter Irvin

Art - Ben Smock

Our submission for the 149th Weekly Game Jam. The theme was "Last One Left" so we decided to make a silly game about a cop's last week where you have to continue your usual duties while trying to avoid the misfortune that follows soon to retire cops. 

We ended up not having as much time to work as we thought and the game ultimately ended up as a tech demo/prototype instead of a finished game.
